Uses of Class
com.google.bitcoin.core.ECKey

  • Packages that use ECKey 
    Package Description
    com.google.bitcoin.core  

    • Uses of ECKey in com.google.bitcoin.core

      Fields in com.google.bitcoin.core with type parameters of type ECKey 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      ArrayList<ECKey> Wallet.keychain
      A list of public/private EC keys owned by this user.
      Methods in com.google.bitcoin.core that return ECKey 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ECKey Wallet.findKeyFromPubHash(byte[] pubkeyHash)
      Locates a keypair from the keychain given the hash of the public key.
      ECKey Wallet.findKeyFromPubKey(byte[] pubkey)
      Locates a keypair from the keychain given the raw public key bytes.
      static ECKey ECKey.fromASN1(byte[] asn1privkey)
      Construct an ECKey from an ASN.1 encoded private key.
      ECKey TransactionOutPoint.getConnectedKey(Wallet wallet)
      Returns the ECKey identified in the connected output, for either pay-to-address scripts or pay-to-key scripts.
      ECKey DumpedPrivateKey.getKey()
      Returns an ECKey created from this encoded private key.
      static ECKey ECKey.recoverFromSignature(int recId, ECKey.ECDSASignature sig, Sha256Hash message, boolean compressed)
      Given the components of a signature and a selector value, recover and return the public key that generated the signature according to the algorithm in SEC1v2 section 4.1.6.
      static ECKey ECKey.signedMessageToKey(String message, String signatureBase64)
      Given an arbitrary piece of text and a Bitcoin-format message signature encoded in base64, returns an ECKey containing the public key that was used to sign it.
      Methods in com.google.bitcoin.core that return types with arguments of type ECKey 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Iterable<ECKey> Wallet.getKeys()
      Returns a snapshot of the keychain.
      Methods in com.google.bitcoin.core with parameters of type ECKey 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Wallet.addKey(ECKey key)
      Adds the given ECKey to the wallet.
      void Transaction.addOutput(BigInteger value, ECKey pubkey)
      Creates an output that pays to the given pubkey directly (no address) with the given value, and adds it to this transaction.
      static byte[] Script.createOutputScript(ECKey pubkey)
      Creates a script that sends coins directly to the given public key.
      boolean Wallet.hasKey(ECKey key)
      Returns true if the given key is in the wallet, false otherwise.
      void WalletEventListener.onKeyAdded(ECKey key)
      Called by the Wallet.addKey(ECKey) method on whatever the calling thread was.
      void AbstractWalletEventListener.onKeyAdded(ECKey key) 
      static Wallet.SendRequest Wallet.SendRequest.to(NetworkParameters params, ECKey destination, BigInteger value) 
      Method parameters in com.google.bitcoin.core with type arguments of type ECKey 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int Wallet.addKeys(List<ECKey> keys)
      Adds the given keys to the wallet.
      Constructors in com.google.bitcoin.core with parameters of type ECKey 
      Constructor and Description
      TransactionOutput(NetworkParameters params, Transaction parent, BigInteger value, ECKey to)
      Creates an output that sends 'value' to the given public key using a simple CHECKSIG script (no addresses).
